title: Patriot's Dream
description: Jan Wilde came to Williamsburg, Virginia, for a much-needed vacation. But her dreams at night were far from restful...Night after night, a stranger called to her, reached out to her from two centuries past, fueled by the fires of war and the fury of passion. He seemed so real, so close--yet by morning he was just a memory. Who was this lover from the past? Only Jan's dreams could reveal the truth...
author: Barbara Michaels
